lines.text: a = int array of size 200
DUMMY
set all values of a to 0
n , k , flag1 , flag2 = int with flag1 = 0 and flag2 = 0
e , s , max = double with e = 0 and s = 0 and max = 0
read n then k
read n values into a
lines.code: for ( int h = 0 ; h < n ; h ++ ) { cin >> a [ h ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 0 to n
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: j , k , fff1 , fff2 = int with fff1 = i and fff2 = i
lines.code: int j , l , fff1 = i , fff2 = i ;

lines.text: set flag1 to 0
set flag2 and e and s to 0
set j to i - 1 and l to i + 1 then loop infinitely decrementing j and incrementing l
if j is less than 0 then set flag1 to 1
if a [ l ] is 0 then set flag2 to 1
if flag1 is 0 and a [ j ] is 1 and fff1 - j is not k
increment e
else if flag1 is 0 and a [ j ] is - 1 and fff1 - j is not k
increment s
if fff1 - j is k then set fff1 to j
lines.code: if ( fff1 - j == k ) { fff1 = j ; }

lines.text: if flag2 is 0 and a [ l ] is 1 and l - fff2 is not k
increment e
else if flag2 is 0 and a [ l ] is - 1 and l - fff2 is not k
increment s
if l - fff2 is k then set fff2 to l
lines.code: if ( l - fff2 == k ) { fff2 = l ; }

lines.text: if flag1 is 1 and flag2 is 1 then break
DUMMY
if fabs of e - s is greater than max then set max to fabs of e - s
lines.code: if ( fabs ( e - s ) > max ) max = fabs ( e - s ) ;

lines.text: DUMMY
print max as int
